entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Ice fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
